sections.heading: Cancellation of liabilities or assessments outstanding on July 1, 2021
sections.text: Section 12-651 to 12-660. - Imposition of tax on marijuana and controlled substances; stamps. Possession of unstamped marijuana or controlled substance by dealer prohibited. Commissioner to provide stamps. Purchase of stamps, lab

sections.heading: to 12-660. - Imposition of tax on marijuana and controlled substances; stamps
sections.text: Possession of unstamped marijuana or controlled substance by dealer prohibited. Commissioner to provide stamps. Purchase of stamps, labels or other indicia. Dealers to keep records; examination by commissioner; assessment
